page.title: 16A SUMMARY OF OUR AREA
page.content: The Parish Church of St.Bartholomew is in the original centre of the town and the housing has been built around it.The green,open spaces have now largely been built on. Between the main shopping area and the council estate is Westhoughton Cricket Ground and a public football ground.Westhoughton Cricket Club play in the Bolton League,and presently have as their professional player a member of the {Indian National Team. { }There are also two popular{Bowling {Greens}at the Red Lion Inn and the Reform Club. Westhoughton High School is the only{ {secondary school}for the area and it also serves as an{evening centre for {adult education}.Westhoughton Town Hall and Library are impressive buildings at one end of Market Street.
